channel.title: 路透财经
channel.description: 这是一个追踪路透财经news的种子

item.title: 观看：德国汉莎航空公司（Lufthansa）的地勤人员在主要机场举行了本月第二次罢工，给周三将继续进行的工资谈判带来了更大压力。
item.description: WATCH: Ground staff at German airline Lufthansa walked off the job at major airports in their second strike this month, raising pressure in wage talks due to continue on Wednesday reut.rs/3I65cxN

item.title: 英国审查银行业资助污染客户的困境
item.description: UK review to look at banking dilemma over financing polluting customers reut.rs/42JSsGK

item.title: 股价下跌后，投资者提名 Fossil 集团董事候选人
item.description: Investor names director candidates at Fossil Group after stock price drop reut.rs/3UONGWm

item.title: 投资者等待国内通胀数据，多伦多证券交易所期货持平
item.description: TSX futures flat as investors await domestic inflation data reut.rs/42P33Ai

item.title: 观看：英伟达（Nvidia）今年业绩大涨，即将公布财报。Gradient Investments 的 Keith Gangl 告诉 @路透社，他预计营收将比预期高出 10 亿美元--但即使令人失望，投资者也应将此作为买入机会
item.description: WATCH: Nvidia is set to report earnings after a stratospheric rise this year. Keith Gangl of Gradient Investments told @Reuters he expects revenue to come in a billion dollars ahead of expectations — but even if it disappoints, investors should take that as a buying opportunity

item.title: 印尼新的绿色投资规则包括煤电厂
item.description: Indonesia's new green investment rulebook includes coal power plants reut.rs/4bCUDjr

item.title: Breakingviews - 中国降息给家庭带来巨大帮助
item.description: Breakingviews - China rate cut gives households big helping hand reut.rs/3I59c1v reut.rs/3I59c1v

item.title: 极光大麻任命前百时美施贵宝高管为首席财务官
item.description: Aurora Cannabis names former Bristol Myers executive as CFO reut.rs/3SLgeNR

item.title: 印度中央银行 12 月在即期外汇市场净买入 20.7 亿美元 - 公告
item.description: India cenbank net bought $2.07 bln in spot forex market in December – bulletin reut.rs/3UMXP5Y

item.title: 继 2023 年业绩突出之后，国际酒店集团今年将向股东返还超过 10 亿美元的资金
item.description: IHG to return over $1 bln to shareholders this year after stellar 2023 reut.rs/3V4hazV

item.title: 俄罗斯第二大银行 VTB 公布 2023 年利润达 47 亿美元，创历史新高
item.description: Russia's second-largest bank VTB reports record 2023 profit of $4.7 bln reut.rs/48w5usM

item.title: 对冲基金流动 高盛称降息前对冲基金加倍看空中国
item.description: HEDGE FLOW Hedge funds double down on China ahead of rate cut, Goldman says reut.rs/48lISuU

item.title: 纽约银行股价暴跌促使美国银行监管机构进行健康检查
item.description: NYCB stock rout prompts US bank regulators to conduct health checks reut.rs/42JdZPO

item.title: 观看：巴菲特支持的消费银行 Capital One 计划以 353 亿美元收购信用卡发行商 Discover Financial Services，以组建美国资产排名第六的银行和美国信用卡巨头。
item.description: WATCH: In a deal, seeking to form the sixth-largest US bank by assets and a US credit card behemoth, Warren Buffett-backed consumer bank Capital One plans to acquire credit card issuer Discover Financial Services for $35.3 billion reut.rs/3wxqS3a

item.title: Breakingviews - 中国降息给家庭带来巨大帮助
item.description: Breakingviews - China rate cut gives households big helping hand reut.rs/3wnSBDy reut.rs/3wnSBDy

item.title: Breakingviews - 矿商必和必拓将尾部风险浮出水面
item.description: Breakingviews - Miner BHP brings tail risks up to the surface reut.rs/4bKERTK reut.rs/4bKERTK

item.title: 巴克莱银行周二制定了一项三年计划来重振其低迷的股价，包括削减 20 亿英镑的成本、向股东返还 126 亿美元以及投资于高回报的英国零售银行。更多信息请点击此处：
item.description: Barclays laid out a three-year plan to revive its flagging share price on Tuesday, including axing 2 billion pounds of costs, returning $12.6 billion to shareholders and investing in its high-returning UK retail bank. More here: reut.rs/49DFTir

item.title: 印尼新的绿色投资规则包括煤电厂
item.description: Indonesia's new green investment rulebook includes coal power plants reut.rs/3uEV9wu

item.title: 观看：拜登政府宣布向 GlobalFoundries 公司拨款 15 亿美元，用于加强半导体生产，旨在强化国内供应链
item.description: WATCH: The Biden administration has announced a $1.5 billion award to GlobalFoundries to enhance semiconductor production, aiming to strengthen domestic supply chains reut.rs/42KxDuC

item.title: 巴西飞机制造商巴西航空工业公司（Embraer）的一位高管说，与其他一些公司相比，该公司受普惠发动机问题的影响较小，但也不能独善其身。更多信息请点击此处：
item.description: Embraer is less affected than some other companies by issues with Pratt & Whitney engines but not immune, a senior executive at the Brazilian planemaker said. More here: reut.rs/49IBQ4b

item.title: 继 2023 年业绩突出之后，国际酒店集团今年将向股东返还超过 10 亿美元的资金
item.description: IHG to return over $1 bln to shareholders this year after stellar 2023 reut.rs/49GMZTm

item.title: 俄罗斯第二大银行 VTB 公布 2023 年利润达 47 亿美元，创历史新高
item.description: Russia's second-largest bank VTB reports record 2023 profit of $4.7 bln reut.rs/3uIrWRp

item.title: 巴克莱银行年度利润下降 6%，为提振股价推出全面改革计划
item.description: Barclays annual profit falls 6%, unveils overhaul to boost shares reut.rs/49AZe3E

item.title: 中国共产党的官方报纸称，中国最高金融监督机构誓言继续开展一场运动，以确保金融业坚持共产党的价值观并服务于经济，同时避免 "过度 "和 "鲁莽 "的风险。更多信息请点击此处：
item.description: China's top financial watchdogs vowed to keep up a campaign to ensure that the sector adheres to Communist Party values and serves the economy while avoiding ‘excessive’ and ‘reckless’ risks, the party's official newspaper said. More here: reut.rs/4bJVFKn

item.title: Breakingviews - 矿商必和必拓将尾部风险浮出水面
item.description: Breakingviews - Miner BHP brings tail risks up to the surface reut.rs/3T3Wp5N reut.rs/3T3Wp5N

item.title: 随着核燃料原料价格的飙升，投资银行高盛（Goldman Sachs）和麦格理（Macquarie）以及一些对冲基金正将自己定位为从新崛起的铀行业中获益。更多信息请点击此处：
item.description: Investment banks Goldman Sachs and Macquarie as well as some hedge funds are positioning themselves to reap the benefits of a newly buoyant uranium sector as prices of the nuclear fuel ingredient spike. More here: reut.rs/3T5VDFA

item.title: 一位负责货币市场的韩国高级官员表示，他的团队正在与证券结算机构欧洲清算公司（Euroclear）进行谈判，旨在促进外国投资者使用韩元，最终吸引更多资本流入。更多信息请点击此处：
item.description: A senior South Korean official in charge of currency markets said his team was in talks with securities settlement house Euroclear, aiming to boost foreign investors' access to the won currency and eventually attract more capital inflows. More here: reut.rs/3I6BDMD

item.title: 中国市场连续三年的亏损和华盛顿的反华言论，并没有阻止一些美国资产管理公司推出他们希望在中国股市反弹时能够兴旺发达的产品。更多信息请点击此处：
item.description: Three straight years of losses from Chinese markets and anti-Beijing rhetoric from Washington have not deterred some US asset managers from introducing products they hope will thrive if Chinese stocks rebound. More here: reut.rs/3SFoaAe

item.title: 独家报道：价值 450 亿美元的英国工作场所养老基金 Nest 预计将私人资产的持有量提高到其投资组合的 30%，这是英国大型退休计划进军另类投资的最重要举措之一。更多信息请点击此处：
item.description: Exclusive: Nest, a $45 billion UK workplace pension fund, expects to ramp up private assets holdings to as much as 30% of its portfolio, in one of the most significant moves into alternative investments by a large UK retirement scheme. More here: reut.rs/4bM6NXo

item.title: 观看：沃伦-巴菲特（Warren Buffett）支持的美国消费银行Capital One计划收购美国信用卡发行商发现金融服务公司（Discover Financial Services），这是一项价值353亿美元的全股票交易，两家公司表示将打造一个全球支付巨头。
item.description: WATCH: Warren Buffett-backed US consumer bank Capital One plans to acquire US credit card issuer Discover Financial Services in an all-stock transaction valued at $35.3 billion to create a global payments giant, the companies said reut.rs/3wxqS3a
